name: @nota/nativescript-accessibility-ext
description: Add support for Accessiblity in NativeScript

scripts.build: npm i && npm-run-all lint tsc scss
scripts.postclone: npm i && node scripts/postclone.js && cd ../demo && npm i && cd ../src && npm run plugin.link
scripts.test.android: npm i && npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && tns build android && tns test android --justlaunch
scripts.test.ios: npm i && npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && tns build ios && tns test ios --justlaunch
scripts.plugin.sasswatch: npm run scss && npm run scss -- --watch
scripts.demo.ios: npm i && npm-run-all tsc --parallel plugin.watch demo.ios.start
scripts.demo.android: npm i && npm-run-all tsc --parallel plugin.watch demo.android.start
scripts.demo-ng.ios: npm i && npm-run-all tsc --parallel plugin.watch demo-ng.ios.start
scripts.demo-ng.android: npm i && npm-run-all tsc --parallel plugin.watch demo-ng.android.start
scripts.plugin.prepare: npm run build && (cd ../demo && tns plugin remove @nota/nativescript-accessibility-ext && tns plugin add ../src) && (cd ../demo-ng && tns plugin remove @nota/nativescript-accessibility-ext && tns plugin add ../src)
scripts.clean: npm-run-all clean.demo clean.demo clean.demo-ng && npm run plugin.link
scripts.clean.demo: cd ../demo && rimraf hooks node_modules platforms package-lock.json
scripts.clean.demo-ng: cd ../demo-ng && rimraf hooks node_modules platforms package-lock.json
